test.name: As a user I should be able to add WLD device to existing location by using Lumina application

kw.name: Given : user launches and logs in to the Lumina application
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user launches and logs in to the Lumina application'. Error Occured - null

kw.name: And : user navigates to "Water Leak Detector Setup" screen from the "Add New Device Dashboard" screen

kw.name: And : user clicks on "Next" button
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user clicks on "Next" button'. Error Occured - null

kw.name: When : user should be displayed with the "Choose Location" screen
kw.msg: [FAIL - Framework Configuration] Execute Keyword : Not able to execute Step - 'user should be displayed with the "Choose Location" screen'. Error Occured - null
